biotools.summary: A web based virtual gallery of biological specimens using X-ray microtomography. Micro-computed tomography or microCT is a method of non-destructive 3D x-ray microscopy, which allows the users to create 3D models of objects from a series of x-ray projection images, similar to the conventional clinical computer tomography.

bioschemas.name: LifeWatchGreece MicroCT vLab
